item.title: Jenkins X Pipelines Questions
item.description: For more background see the guide on Serverless Jenkins X Pipelines using Tekton. There is also the Jenkins X Pipelines Syntax Reference How do I add a custom step? To add a new custom step to your jenkins-x.yml file see how to use the jx create step How do Jenkins X Pipelines compare to Jenkins pipelines? See the differences between Jenkins X and Jenkins Pipelines How do I get IDE completion editing jenkins-x.
